commands.name: unit test
commands.command: C:/python27/python.exe D:/_Napata/dev/apps/cahotech-monorepo/tools/change-jest-config.py && ng test chimmo --codeCoverage && ng test ui --codeCoverage && ng test service --codeCoverage

commands.name: native-win
commands.command: cd D:/_Napata/dev/apps/cahotech-monorepo/apps && ng build chimmo --prod && C:/python27/python.exe D:/_Napata/dev/apps/cahotech-monorepo/tools/pacthing_index.py && cd D:/_Napata/dev/apps/cahotech-monorepo/apps/chimmo-native && cordova run windows
